content_descriptors.notes:
In "Vultures - Scavengers of Death," players will encounter battles against mutants and monsters, which may involve depictions of blood and violence. Additionally, characters in the game may use strong language, including cursing, and make references to alcohol and tobacco. 

There may be mature themes and topics related to survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Players with sensitivity to these themes should exercise caution and consider the game's content before playing.

name: Vultures - Scavengers of Death Demo
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
